content: Hi! (Just joined; new to Zulip; mostly lurking) Could/should someone of the admins change the organization logo to something rusty? And what about the generic favicon, is this customizable?

Favicon isn't customizable unfortunately. I've thrown together some simple logos to replace the Zulip one. Happy to replace these with more official ones if anyone has some.

Here are the raw files I used for whichever poor soul will end up looking for them, for some reason, years from now:
black.png
white.png
zulip-rust-banner-white.afdesign
zulip-rust-banner-black.afdesign
Filed this issue with Zulip for custom favicon support.
Just don't use the Rust logo as the favicon directly, that would make it indistinguishable from other sites favicons (like documentation)
